sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react" import {MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardHeader, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBJumbotron, MDBRow} from "mdbreact" import {Accordion, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' class Experience extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) Experience.createCardBodyComponent = Experience.createCardBodyComponent.bind(this) Experience.getColor = Experience.getColor.bind(this) Experience.createActivitiesList = Experience.createActivitiesList.bind(this) } static getColor(index) { let color if (index % 2 === 0) { color = "bootstrapDark-1 text-light" } else { color = "bootstrapDark-2 text-light" } return color } static createActivitiesList(description) { let ret = "" for (let item in description) { ret = ret.concat("
  • " + description[item] + "
    • ") } return ret } static createCardBodyComponent(description, index) { return (
      {description.map((desc) =>
    • {desc}
      • )}
    ) } render() { return ( {/*Header*/}

    Experience

         {/*Regis*/} The Regis Company - Modeling Intern (July 2019 - August 2019) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Analyzed, documented, and helped to refactor a backend system", "Hello" ], 0)} {/*Smash*/} Smash Burger - Preperation/Cooking Staff (May 2018 - August 2018) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Demonstrated strong workflow management skills as shown from my ability to keep up with demand during peek hours", "Something" ], 1)} {/*Kings*/} King Supers - Deli Clerk (July 2017 - September 2017) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Analyzed, documented, and helped to refactor a backend system", "Hello" ], 2)} {/*Radio*/} Radio Shack - Sales Associate (June 2016 - August 2016) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Analyzed, documented, and helped to refactor a backend system", "Hello" ], 3)} {/*JP*/} JP Total Landscaping - Crew Assistant (May 2015 - August 2015) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Analyzed, documented, and helped to refactor a backend system", "Hello" ], 4)} {/*Kittredge*/} Kittredge Animal Clinic - Kennel Technician (May 2014 - March 2015) {Experience.createCardBodyComponent([ "Analyzed, documented, and helped to refactor a backend system", "Hello" ], 5)}


    ) } } export default Experience
